title: On type classification. I need an updated guide.
content:
I am on the process of classifying my fonts on my PC, according to type style. I am trying to follow the VOX system, but it is quite outdated. Many fonts from the last thirty years just don't fit. Does anyone in here know about an updated font classification system URL or document?

Thanks  
-Mosh
author: mosh

comments.content: Thanks, Tina, for the link. I have downloaded it and give it a thorough reading. Seems it is a thorny subject.
